Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 34th overall pick, by Arizona in 2009...
Traded from Arizona to Tampa Bay on 1/31/2011 (Going to TB: SS B. Fernandez, CF V. Machado, 1B A. Rizzo, C J. Realmuto, CF T. Wheeler. Going to ARI: P R. Nolasco, P J. Hirsch, P D. Hudson)...
Injured on 4/25/2013 with a Bruised Neck, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 6/16/2013, off Carlos Silva (CHA)...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Kansas City on 8/29/2014...
Hit 3 homeruns against Arizona, driving in 5 runs on 7/24/2015...
Injured on 8/20/2016 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 7 weeks...
Traded from Tampa Bay to Milwaukee on 6/16/2017 (Going to MIL: C B. De La Rosa, DH B. Belt, CF T. Wheeler, P L. Shaw. Going to TB: P J. Gobble, 1B N. Swisher, CF G. Springer, 1B S. Buckley, SS T.
Tomiichi)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2017, hitting .667 with 6 HR, 13 RBI...
Traded from Milwaukee to Seattle on 2/4/2018 (Going to MIL: 2B E. Andrus, P J. Petty Jr., 1B F. Moore Jr.. Going to SEA: CF T. Wheeler)...
Injured on 6/8/2018 with a Fractured Hand, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 6/19/2019 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 2019...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against New York (A) on 10/4/2020...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 2020...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Tampa Bay on 5/22/2021...
Injured on 5/30/2021 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
